analysis.description:
Crowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/7/0xa04e5dddc787d72258ab1c976be082d48e83de66.sol#339-350) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(restricted,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/7/0xa04e5dddc787d72258ab1c976be082d48e83de66.sol#348)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0xa04e5dddc787d72258ab1c976be082d48e83de66.sol#351-402) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,numTokens) (/unique_chucks/7/0xa04e5dddc787d72258ab1c976be082d48e83de66.sol)

Crowdsale.mint (/unique_chucks/7/0xa04e5dddc787d72258ab1c976be082d48e83de66.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/7/0xa04e5dddc787d72258ab1c976be082d48e83de66.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0xa04e5dddc787d72258ab1c976be082d48e83de66.sol#351-402):
	External calls:
	- totalSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/7/0xa04e5dddc787d72258ab1c976be082d48e83de66.sol#353-354)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(rest) (/unique_chucks/7/0xa04e5dddc787d72258ab1c976be082d48e83de66.sol#398-399)
	- multisig.transfer(msg.value.sub(rest)) (/unique_chucks/7/0xa04e5dddc787d72258ab1c976be082d48e83de66.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
